mapper.select: select a.*, b.*, c.product_name, c.fk_category, d.lookup_name as category_name, e.lookup_name as product_unit, c.qty as product_stock from po a inner join po_detail b on a.pk_po = b.fk_po inner join product c on c.pk_product = b.fk_product inner join lookup d on d.pk_lookup = c.fk_category inner join lookup e on e.pk_lookup = c.fk_unit where a.pk_po = #{pkPo}
mapper.insert: insert into po ( po_no, po_date, fk_employee, status, created_date, created_by ) values ( #{poNo}, #{poDate}, #{fkEmployee}, #{status}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy} )
